docs.text: Steps to edit these docs: Getting started Clone https://github.com/JoaoSilvaDev/spike-docs Install Node.js Run 'pip install mkdocs' cd into the folder in the repo "spike-mkdocs" To preview the docs -> 'mkdocs serve' To deply the docs -> 'mkdocs gh-deploy' Adding a new page Create a .md file inside the docs folder. (Remember to add prefix "tech_" or "design_") Add your new page to the side bar by editing the mkdocs.yml file. (see image below)
docs.title: READ ME
